column2: The Marketing/Creative Services Program Manager works as a direct liaison with different internal stakeholders, to ensure projects are delivered on-time and within budget. The primary responsibilities are to manage project details from beginning to end, taking full ownership, managing overall coordination, implementation, and execution as well as ensuring consistency with company strategy, commitments and goals. This person will also provide internal and external support to the Marketing Operations Sr. Manager developing communication strategies to attract new clients.             The Program Manager is a resourceful, highly organized and proactive leader who will manage expectations, coordinate inputs from cross-functional teams, and will ensure marketing, creative and translations projects are completed.             ?       DETAILED RESPONSIBILITIES:              Plan, budget, oversee and document all aspects of the specific program or project. Identify, drive, and track resolution of issues and risks.     Prioritize and assign multiple project requests in a timely fashion.     Prepare and deliver weekly and monthly reports to track project progress and results (postmortem reports).     Identify, drive, and track resolution of issues and risks.     Help develop initiatives to increase customer satisfaction and retention.     Create standardization formats and processes in order to keep projects development equal between project managers.     Identify best practices and evolve daily operations as necessary.     Guide project management specialists in conducting timely follow-ups to track project deliverables from creative team     End to end follow up of high complexity/impact projects. Managing video/digital/event/promotion projects from a project management perspective.     Participate in key strategical meetings for stakeholders portfolio growth.     Particpate in stakeholder leadership meetings to identify their needs and personalize our services.     Analyze our vendor opportunities/challenges to increase our freelancer portfolio.              REQUIRED QUALIFICATIONS:              Skills             Knowledge of project management methodology.     Demonstrate strong strategic, analytical and creative problem-solving abilities.     High sense of urgency and servant leadership.     Strong organizational abilities, including time and resource management, and strict attention to detail.     Ability to solve problems and meet deadlines with little-to-no supervision.      Independent follow-through ability (monitoring and controlling).     Results-driven, fast learner and able to work in a fast-paced environment.      Effective negotiation and conflict management skills.     Strong interpersonal and team building skills, work well with clients, partners and vendors..     Strong resilience and frustration tolerance.     Strong capabilities to look further that self awareness.     High developed emotional intelligence.     High disposition to face new challenges..     With strong coaching capabilities.     Knowledge of integrated marketing and what it takes to get projects done right.     Must have a thorough understanding of creative, digital & video processes.     Must have an understanding of digital projects related to websites and its metrics (analytics).     Advanced knowledge on high complexity 360 marketing campaigns.     Effective written and verbal communication and proofreading skills.     Proficiency in MS PowerPoint, Excel, Word, Outlook Mac / PC.     Effective teaching and training skills             Languages:         Bilingual. (English - Spanish, 99%). Written and Oral.             Experience             10 to 12 years of experience as a program manager/account manager (marketing)     8 years of experience in advertising agencies (client services department)     6years working in digital marketing projects      Experience working with other regions or markets outside Mexico (preferably United States)     Experience in working with any of these Project Management tools (/Workfront/MS Project/ TeamGantt/ Gantter/ FastTrack Schedule, Agile)      Experience implementing various large-scale integrated projects.     Experience managing outside agencies/vendors             Education:              Bachelor s degree Communications, Marketing, Advertising or a related field              PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS:              PMP Certification, Scrum Master     Yellow Belt Certification
column11: PMP, Project management, Analytical, Marketing operations, Spanish, Digital marketing, Resource management, Team building, Analytics, Monitoring

column2: As a Lead Facilitator your primary responsibility will be to work with young people, adults, teachers, and the government system. You will play a vital role in facilitating trainings, workshops, and camps for young people to empower and inspire.              To design spaces for the leadership teams to be able to redefine their purpose towards education.              Facilitating collaborations                  Execute aspects of Dream a Dream s strategy as it pertains to its partnership with the Government of Telangana.              Create designs for the workshops and contextualise sessions on social-emotional learning for all stakeholders within the education systems              Deliver workshops and sessions for relevant stakeholders through online and offline media.              Participate in learning and debrief sessions, to enhance the quality of delivery of the Dream a Dream s workshops              Understand impact assessment of the workshops and improve the quality of training              Coordinate with the internal teams to create different types of SEL and life skills content.              Conduct regular field visits. Interact with teachers and other stakeholders to assess and understand how training is translated into execution of various curriculums.              Facilitation (Facilitate, Design and Trainings)                  Improvise contents of the workshop in the moment and be aware of the plan / curriculum being only a guiding document              Ability to design activities and workshops (using the Facilitation Principles. )              Develop curriculums for young people to meet the needs of the context.              Train other facilitators / stakeholders on the Principles / Practices / Processes of facilitation with a minimum of 10-day TOT workshop.              Provide one-on-one mentoring on principles of facilitations.              Technical skills required for the role.              Hold space for the group and individuals to express themselves deeply.              Invite individual and group creativity.              Managing Strong Emotions in a group (Manage Triggers)          Develop the culture of appreciation.          Prior engagement with young people, teachers and experience in education with strong training-facilitation skills in Education space is highly recommended.              Ability to travel to different parts of Telangana and India at a short notice                      Qualifications Competencies:                  Strong alignment with the organization s values of equity, dignity, and inclusion              Proven experience in advocacy, partnerships, and networking              Excellent project management skills, including the ability to manage multiple priorities and stakeholders.              In-depth understanding of the education sector and related policy issues              Exceptional collaboration, reflection, and communication skills, particularly in managing complex communication.              Strong facilitation and movement-building abilities              Proven ability to work effectively in a multicultural and global digital environment, with a demonstrated sensitivity to different cultures.              Strong understanding of systems thinking and the ability to apply it in practice.              Fluent in Telugu and English. Fluent in Hindi is an additional advantage.
column11: Training, Networking, Diversity and Inclusion, Project management, Equity, Management

column2: - Identify the capacity building needs of the national, state and city-level governments for the Mission s implementation and community engagement. Assess and document existing capacity gaps of resource organizations, SHGs and CBOs.      - Prepare a capacity building plan to build the capacity of state/ district/ ULB-level and community-level federations and oversee it implementation.      - Ensure inclusion and sustainability in the capacity development plans for enhancing urban poor s access to livelihoods.      - Design and develop thematic training modules (in collaboration with other team members) to support regional/ local trainers needs including income-generating activities, financial management monitoring and evaluation, and technical and project management.      - Develop training manuals and implementation guidelines for state and city mission counterparts, and Training of Trainers (ToT) programs targeting the officials and field      - Identify and organize collaborative partnerships with regional and local trainers/ capacity development experts. Initiate, lead and follow relevant partnerships with centres of excellence with a regional focus to support and pursue a sustainable supply of training. Also, support state missions and partners to organize and facilitate training workshops.      - Ensure the sharing of experiences between regions/ states/ cities and dissemination of good      - Constantly analyze microenterprise development and provide feedback/ guidance/ course correction to improve their efficiency and effectiveness.      - Coordinate component-specific inputs and expertise from the client, donors, UMC head office and partners in a collaborative fashion        Qualifications and skills:       - An advanced degree (Masters or equivalent) in public policy, urban planning, economics, management or development-related discipline with a focus on livelihoods      - Minimum, 10 years of relevant experience in training, and management of development      - Experience in academics and an understanding of adult learning pedagogy would be      - Minimum of 2 years working experience in a ministry of the national government, or a department of a state government will be an added advantage      - Knowledge of relevant context, issues of livelihood development and urban poverty      - Fluency in both written and spoken Hindi and English.      - Works collaboratively with colleagues to achieve the program goals      - Strong ability to host multi-disciplinary team of experts/ consultants and facilitate oral and      - Strong experience and track record of training government officials (all levels), private sector or non-traditional resource partners in the field of urban poverty and livelihood      - Maturity and confidence in dealing with the staff of government institutions and community      - Computer proficiency, especially related to professional office software packages (Microsoft      - Excellent written communication skills, with analytic capacity preparation and assessment      - Willingness to travel within India and outside India on a need basis

column1: Appy For F & B SERVICE / BAR TRAINER
column2: Minimum 3-5 years of experience in the hospitality industry.         Should have completed Degree in Hotel Management from a reputed institute.         A good level of knowledge relevant to the subject and professional area.         A sound understanding of pedagogy.       The primary responsibility of a Hospitality Trainer is to teach students how to deliver world-class customer service with knowledge in core departments. Therefore, Hospitality Trainers work towards ensuring this service is delivered. Besides this, their responsibilities comprise,       Teaching/instructing students         Giving the solution related to course content         Providing theoretical and practical knowledge to students         Knowing/capacity to monitor/instruct the students         Provide academic as well as industry knowledge         Profound knowledge of student assessment process         Deep knowledge of instructional methodologies         Ability to develop online courses         Able to prepare Notes, Assignments, Question Paper         Effective Communication and Personality Development         Develop course curriculum, course handouts, lectures, labs, and presentations         Participate in program-level learning assessment. Participation includes helping articulate learning outcomes, choosing and administering measures, evaluating student performance, and suggesting changes to improve student learning.         Work with other faculty and administrators in developing program curriculum, standards, and policies, including reviewing and participating in the textbook selection process where appropriate         Design teaching material and deliver it either across a range of modules or within a subject area.         Use appropriate teaching, learning support, and assessment methods.         Supervise student projects and, e.g., field trips and, where appropriate, placements.         Identify areas where the current provision requires revision or improvement.         Contribute to the planning, design, and development of objectives and material.         Set, mark and assess work and examinations and provide feedback to students.         Recognizing gaps in knowledge and skills and filling them adequately         Planning and designing training programs         Aiding in the recruitment of suitable candidates for particular roles         Assigning tasks to students in line with their capabilities         Conducting training on proper work techniques and skills as per standards         Providing training in communication and aptitude         Managing events that are conducted at the organization         Plan, organize, and direct a wide range of on/off campus training activities.         Conduct orientation sessions on a weekly, monthly, and yearly basis.         Continuously Focus on the associate development of student needs when required.         Conduct training needs assessments, design and develop training programs and facilitate the delivery of programs.         Should be able to take classes (Theory Practical) for the Hotel Management Courses such as         15 Months Program Hospitality Management         12 Months Program in Culinary Management         6 Months Program in Housekeeping Operations         3 Months Program in Mixology         Practical experience in the hospitality industry         Strong writing and editing skills         Good presentation and time management skills         Excellent communication and interpersonal skills         Ability to work with different teams and leadership styles         Demonstration of outstanding customer service         Possess sufficient breadth or depth of specialist knowledge in the discipline to develop teaching and research programs and learning support.         Use a range of delivery techniques.         Fair understanding of technical tools such as spreadsheets, word processors, databases, etc.         Knowledge of video conferencing, webinars, data analysis, statistics, and similar others         Willing to work non-conventional hours, including weekends and holidays         Learning and Applying Personal Expertise.         Flair for sharing knowledge and organizing knowledge-sharing sessions.         Experience in working with others in a supervisory / guiding / supporting / mentoring capacity.
column11: Training, Housekeeping, Data analysis, Hospitality management, Hotel management, Video conferencing, Personality development, Customer service, Teaching, Recruitment

column2: The primary responsibility entails development of content to enable and support various stakeholders (such as school teachers, government officials, educators SCERT/DIET/ NGO professionals, trainers, etc.) in promoting life skills and social emotional learning for the holistic development of young people and children in schools in Nagaland.         What are we looking for           Deep commitment towards solving the complex challenges of our education system     Passion, persistence and strong will to transform the lives of young people     Strong desire to understand the nuances of current education system and the change it requires to support young people thrive in this difficult situation     Positive attitude towards continuous learning, honest feedback and self-enlightening     Ability to innovate, adapt and act in difficult circumstances and entrepreneurial mindset               What will you work on           Supporting the contextualisation of curriculum, working closely with Directorate of Education and SCERT in Kohima, content creation, training, facilitation, implementation, documentation, monitoring and evaluation.     Development of self-learning course and training content on Social Emotional Learning.     Create designs for the workshops and sessions on social-emotional learning     Develop content for the training courses and workshops on social-emotional learning.     Deliver workshops and sessions for relevant stakeholders through online and offline media.     Coordinate with the internal teams to create different types of SEL content.     Participate in learning and debrief sessions, to enhance the quality of delivery of the Dream A Dream s workshops.     Understand impact assessment of the workshops and improve the quality of trainings.     Coordinate with and support the external stakeholders (NGOs, research agencies) to build a life skills approach in their work.     Become a life skills expert; champion and advocate for deepening the understanding of life skills in education system.     Provide support to the internal teams in research and M&E work as well as to build an ecosystem premised on life skills approach.     Contribute to achievement of strategic and operational goals set by the organization.     Research, Develop, collaborate with organization that support government schools in Nagaland with curriculum, Pedagogy and Assessment tool which enables thriving in young people     Contribute to achievement of strategic and operational goals set by the organization.     Closely work with Associate Director to support advocacy efforts               What are the desired qualifications, skills and abilities            Minimum of 5 to 8 years of work experience preferably in development sector     Prior engagement with young people and experience in education sector, Life Skills or facilitation with young people is highly recommended.     Strong spoken communication and articulation skills. Fluency in English, Local Language or dialects and Hindi, and other Indian languages is a definite plus.     Ability to travel to different parts of country to gain insights about the education sector and holistic development of the child

column2: Target Data Sciences is offering an exciting opportunity to solve state of the art problems in AdTech. Target s Roundel group is emerging as one of the biggest RMN players in US ad-tech ecosystem. As we develop the capabilities of our tech ecosystem, we are looking for driven and passionate individuals with deep AdTech science and engineering experience who can make a change in AdTech development. If you are that person, you can expect to be involved in:        Defining, developing and integrating modules for algorithmic decision making with the ad serving tech platform      Influencing roadmaps and driving its execution with a team of talented scientists      Developing a multi-year vision of embedding science with adtech platform and collaborating with engineers and science team to bring it to life              Example problem statements:          How to maximize yield for advertisers and revenue for Target      Technology and algorithms for real time algorithms on ad serving.      Architecture to create a set of connected tech capabilities from media planning to media optimization and measurement.              Expected skills    :        Minimum five years of experience as a practitioner of AdTech      Technical proficiency in algorithms, ad science, and engineering      Strong collaborator and mentor              Preferred Educational background    :        Computer Science graduates from reputed engineering institutes with 10+ years of experience in data science, artificial intelligence      MTech or MS (Statistics, Economics) with relevant experience of 12+ years      PhD with relevant experience of 7+ years of experience              Preferred domain experience    : Creating tech led solutions in advertising, customer relevancy models, bidding strategy, click through rate modelling, etc.

column2: We are seeking an experienced and versatile Product Manager - Nutrition Science, to join our team      In this role, you will lead our nutrition and wellness initiatives, bringing your scientific expertise to the development of innovative products      As a key member of our team, you will drive research in the fields of nutrition, health, and wellness, and collaborate closely with cross- functional teams to ensure our products meet the highest standards of quality and efficacy      Your role will encompass scientific research, nutritional product development, and serving as our nutrition expert in public engagements                                     Key Responsibilities                                  Nutritional Expertise:                          As a Product Manager - Nutrition Science, you will serve as our in-house expert in the field of nutrition, health, and wellness. Your insights will guide the development of products that meet the highest standards of nutritional quality and efficacy.                                Scientific Research:                          You will lead and oversee scientific research initiatives related to nutrition, health, and wellness. This includes conducting studies, analyzing data, and disseminating findings to inform product development.                                Product Development:                          Collaborate closely with cross-functional teams to conceptualize, develop, and refine nutrition and wellness products. Your input will be crucial in ensuring that our products align with regulatory guidelines and consumer expectations.                                Nutritional Communication:                          Work with our marketing team to ensure that product messaging is scientifically sound and accurately conveys the health benefits of our offerings. Your expertise will support the creation of compelling, evidence- based content.                                Public Engagement:                          Represent TWF Flours as a nutrition authority in various public engagements, including speaking engagements, videos, and webinars. Your role is to communicate the science behind our products and their positive impact on health and wellness.                                Collaboration:                          Collaborate with internal teams, including R&D, legal, regulatory, and marketing, to ensure the successful development and launch of products in compliance with relevant regulations.                                Scientific Documentation:                          Create and maintain scientific dossiers, analysis reports, and nutritional notes for various product projects, providing transparency and accountability.                                            Industry Partnerships:                          Establish and nurture relationships with key opinion leaders, academia, government institutions, and industry organizations to stay at the forefront of nutritional trends and regulations.                                      Requirements                                                Advanced degree in Food/Nutrition/Medicine or a related field.                                A proven track record of scientific research in the areas of nutrition, health, and wellness.                                Comprehensive knowledge of regulatory guidelines, including WHO, FSSAI, and EFSA.                                Strong collaboration skills with the ability to work seamlessly with cross-functional teams.                                Exceptional communication and presentation skills.                                A history of scientific publications and active participation in industry associations.                                Prior experience in the consumer industry.                            Benefits                                          Fast-track career growth within the organization.                                Exposure to diverse projects and responsibilities.                                Entrepreneurial environment                                Industry leading compensation
column11: Head Business Development, Data analysis, Nutrition, Food technology, SMS, Manager Technology, Wellness, FMCG, Research, CRM

column2: We are seeking an extraordinary individual, an educational trailblazer, to assume the pivotal role of Founding Head of School (HoS) and join us in creating a groundbreaking educational ecosystem where students can be themselves, pursue their passions, and redefine the boundaries of what true education can achieve. As the HoS, you will embarkon a transformative journey, shaping the future ofeducation and inspiring generations to come. In this role, you will have the unique opportunity to build the foundation of Ekya Nava, handpicking the founding teaching staff, building the curriculum, and setting the stage for an environment that sparks creativity, innovation, and boundless curiosity. As the visionary leader, you will be at the forefront of the educational revolution, driving research and pioneering innovative programs that redefine the boundaries of learning. As the HoS, you will breathe life into our vision, bringing to life the intent of this new educational structure and emphasising the integration of innovation within our existing system. You will serve as the educational head, ensuring the seamless implementation of policies, regulations, and procedures that cultivate a safe and nurturing learning ecosystem. By fostering a climate and culture that embraces tradition, relationships, and best practices, you will create an atmosphere that challenges and motivates our diverse students, teachers, and parents to achieve unparalleled academic excellence. Key Roles and Responsibilities : - As the HoS, you will lead the charge in redefining education through technology, creativity, and hands-on experiential learning. - Your visionary leadership will shape the school's future, inspire a culture of innovation, and empower students to thrive in a rapidly changing world. - Provide visionary leadership and strategic direction to Ekya Nava, shaping it into a pioneering institution of innovation and technology. - Develop and articulate a clear vision for the school, aligning it with the overall mission and goals of Ekya Schools' portfolio. - Inspire and motivate the teaching staff, students, and parents to embrace a culture of innovation and excellence. - Conduct extensive research and stay abreast of the latest trends, methodologies, and best practices in innovative education. - Design and develop cutting-edge, future-forward educational programs that integrate technology, innovation, and hands-on experiential learning. - Foster a multidisciplinary approach to education that encourages creativity, critical thinking, problem-solving, and collaboration. Leadership and Vision: - Educational Program Development - Recruit, hire, and onboard exceptional educators and staff who share the vision and values of Ekya Nava. - Provide mentorship, support, and professional development opportunities to the teaching staff, fostering a culture of continuous growth and learning. - Foster a collaborative and inclusive work environment that promotes teamwork, creativity, and innovation. Staff Recruitment and Development: - Ensure effective day-to-day operations of the school, including student admissions, facilities management, and budget. - Implement policies, procedures, and guidelines that ensure a safe, inclusive, and nurturing learning environment for all students and staff. - Collaborate with the Ekya Schools administration to align strategies, share resources, and promote a cohesive educational experience across all Ekya campuses. Operational Management : - Oversee the development and implementation of a comprehensive, interdisciplinary curriculum that aligns with the school's vision and objectives. - Ensure curriculum standards are met and regularly review and update the curriculum to reflect emerging educational trends and technologies. - Foster a student-centred learning environment that encourages individualised instruction, personalised learning plans, and student engagement. - Cultivate positive and effective relationships with students, parents, teachers, staff, alumni, and the wider innovation ecosystem/community. - Serve as a spokesperson and advocate for Ekya Nava, engaging with internal and external stakeholders to promote the school's mission and achievements. - Collaborate with parents and guardians to ensure open lines of communication, address their concerns, and foster a strong partnership in their children's education. Stakeholder Engagement : - Curriculum Design and Implementation - Foster a culture of innovation, encouraging teachers and students to explore new teaching methodologies, technologies, and approaches. - Facilitate collaboration and partnerships with external organisations, universities, and industry experts to enhance the innovation ecosystem within Ekya Nava. - Actively seek out grant opportunities, funding, and partnerships to support innovative projects and initiatives within the school. Innovation and Collaboration : Professional Background : - Proven experience in educational leadership roles with a focus on innovation, technology, or related fields. - Strong academic credentials with a master's or doctoral degree in education or a related field. - Extensive knowledge of innovative educational practices, emerging technologies, and pedagogical approaches. - Experience in curriculum design, development, and implementation, integrating technology, creativity, and experiential learning methodologies.
column11: Education Operations, Educational Program Development, Operational Management, strategic direction, Stakeholder Engagement, Curriculum Design, visionary leadership

column2: We are looking for a Vice Principal candidate - The VP works alongside the Principal to provide leadership  and support in the overall management of the school. The role involves a combination of administrative,  instructional, and student-focused responsibilities.   Roles & responsibilities:     Work with the school governing body in the overall management and administration of the school.    Collaborate with school staff to ensure efficient day-to-day operations.    Help develop and implement school policies, procedures, and guidelines.    Address student behavior issues and enforce school rules and disciplinary policies.    Collaborate with teachers and staff to maintain a positive and respectful school culture.    Work with parents and guardians to address student behavior concerns.    Assist in the development and implementation of the school's curriculum, collaborate with teachers  on instructional strategies, curriculum planning, assessment and monitor curriculum alignment with  educational standards.    Support teacher professional development initiatives.    Conduct classroom observations and provide constructive feedback to teachers.    Assist in teacher recruitment, orientation, and retention efforts.    Oversee student services, including counseling and support programs.    Assist in organizing and overseeing extracurricular activities.    Communicate regularly with parents regarding school activities and student progress.    Organize and participate in parent-teacher conferences and meetings.    Foster positive relationships with the local community and external stakeholders.    Work with the school governing body to develop and implement emergency response plans.    Ensure the school complies with safety regulations and protocols.    Engage in continuous professional development to stay updated on educational leadership practices  and promote professional growth opportunities for teachers and staff.    Analyze student performance data to inform instructional strategies to help and prepare reports on  student achievement, attendance, and behavior.    Use data to identify areas for improvement and implement strategies for enhancement.    Work closely with the school governing body to align school goals, objectives and collaborate on  decision-making and strategic planning for the school.    Assume leadership responsibilities in the absence of the Principal.   SKILLS     Excellent Leadership qualities & Communication skills    Personnel management capability.    Can co-ordinate in Student Affairs activities.    Building Community Relations   Qualification:    ??Post Graduate degree, B.Ed  mandatory   ??10-15 years of experience in teaching and Min 5 years of Leadership experience

Curriculum Development: Work with faculty to develop and revise academic programs and courses that align with industry needs and educational standards.     Quality Assurance: Ensure that educational programs and practices meet or exceed accreditation and regulatory standards.     Community Engagement: Foster relationships with local industries, businesses, and community organizations to facilitate partnerships, internships, and job placement opportunities for students. column2: As the HR Manager of a reputed school in Junagadh, Gujarat      You will play a pivotal role in ensuring the smooth functioning of our educational institution by overseeing all human resources-related activities      You will be responsible for scrutinizing applicant data, scheduling interviews and teaching demonstrations, addressing employee concerns, and managing various HR-related tasks              Major Responsibilities:            Applicant Screening:    Reviewing and analyzing applicant data to assess qualifications and suitability for available positions within the school.          Interview Coordination:    Scheduling interviews and teaching demonstrations for potential candidates, ensuring efficient and timely communication throughout the process.          Employee Relations:    Addressing and resolving employee issues, conflicts, and grievances in a fair and timely manner, fostering a positive work environment.          HR Administration:    Managing HR administrative tasks such as maintaining employee records, updating policies and procedures, and ensuring compliance with employment laws and regulations.          Recruitment and Onboarding:    Collaborating with department heads to identify staffing needs, participating in recruitment efforts, and facilitating the onboarding process for new hires.          Performance Management:    Assisting in performance evaluation processes, providing guidance and support to managers and employees regarding performance feedback and improvement plans.          Training and Development:    Coordinating training and development initiatives to enhance employee skills and competencies, supporting professional growth within the organization.                    Requirements        Educational Background:    Bachelors degree in Human Resources Management, Business Administration, or related field. Master s degree preferred.          Experience:    Minimum of 5 years of experience in human resources management, preferably in an educational setting.          Communication Skills:    Excellent verbal and written communication skills, with the ability to effectively interact with diverse stakeholders.          Organizational Skills:    Strong organizational and time management skills, with the ability to prioritize tasks and meet deadlines in a fast-paced environment.          Problem-Solving Skills:    Proven ability to identify and resolve complex HR issues, using sound judgment and discretion.          Interpersonal Skills:    Strong interpersonal skills, with the ability to build rapport and trust with employees at all levels of the organization.          Attention to Detail:    Meticulous attention to detail, ensuring accuracy and thoroughness in all HR-related activities.          Knowledge of Employment Laws:    Comprehensive understanding of relevant employment laws and regulations, with the ability to ensure compliance in all HR practices.          Technology Proficiency:    Proficiency in HRIS software, Microsoft Office Suite, and other relevant HR tools and systems.                    Benefits        Handsome Salary            Accommodation
